function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Variation in size of populations under investigation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Authors not presenting required data for meta-analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High heterogeneity in study populations, design, and exposure","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Studies with high risk of bias or low quality not excluded from sensitivity analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear definition of terms such as \\u2019neighbourhood environment\\u2019 and \\u2019built environment\\u2019 may lead to inconsistent inclusion or exclusion of studies related to contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate piloting of data extraction sheet may result in incomplete or inaccurate recording of study details, leading to potential data errors and bias in the synthesis and analysis.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Publication bias or selective reporting in meta-analysis may lead to an inaccurate estimation of the association between greenspace and contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of communicable diseases from the review may overlook the impact of greenspace on disease transmission and propagation.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of mental health from the review may neglect the potential mental health benefits of greenspace, impacting overall well-being and quality of life.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited scope may result in overlooking the impact of greenspace on certain health outcomes, leading to incomplete evidence for decision-making.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education on disease prevention in greenspaces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Living in a greener neighborhood is linked with stronger greenspace-health associations and lower income-related health inequalities","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration between health care providers and local nature partnerships","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty and temporary interventions in the housing sector due to the pandemic, leading to potential disruptions in the sharing economy and real estate market.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of support for digital transformation processes","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate integration of spatially blind policies and local ones","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of integration between real estate interests and social value in urban regeneration processes","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of innovation in public policies for reusing and sharing commercial spaces.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of guidance and planning in placemaking initiatives","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Members joining the cooperative voluntarily may introduce contagious diseases into the company\\u2019s environment.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordinated innovation in territorial development may hinder progress in local productivity structures.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate promotion of alternative technologies with low environmental impact may lead to unsustainable development practices.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of feasibility studies and planning for the implementation of innovative projects may result in ineffective and unsustainable outcomes.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of profits for urban regeneration interventions may lead to unintended consequences such as displacing vulnerable communities or disrupting natural habitats, potentially affecting the well-being of the population.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity-based entrepreneurial innovations may lead to increased interaction and exposure among individuals, potentially contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Community-based organizations and energy policies may involve physical gatherings and interactions, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The creation of energy communities and collective energy projects may lead to increased physical interaction and social gatherings, posing a risk for disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of skills and tools for local market analysis","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The use of new customer-adapted delivery and collection services may involve direct interaction between delivery personnel and consumers, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The presence of various modalities of interaction with consumers, including in-person engagement methods, increases the risk of disease transmission in retail and neighborhood services.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity economy-based urban agenda may lead to increased proximity and contact between individuals, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity trade involving retail sale of products within a contained area could facilitate the spread of contagious diseases due to the close proximity of customers and employees.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effects of social distancing on tourism, retail, and manufacturing sectors","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of unreliable information during health crisis situations","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate coordination and distribution of essential resources leading to uneven healthcare support","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Divergent interests of stakeholders affecting coordination and communication","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of dependencies and interdependencies among stakeholders","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of information on virus and its impacts","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and allocation of responsibilities between agencies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Constraints in communication during crisis","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need to restore confidence among stakeholders in consolidation phase","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreliance on prevention as a method for mitigating contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Supply chain disruption due to shipping delays, gaps in preparedness, and logistical
